def_en: If you call someone a snob, you disapprove of them because they admire upper-class people and have a low opinion of lower-class people.

def_cn: 自以为(在智力或品位方面)高人一等的人
def_en: If you call someone a snob, you disapprove of them because they behave as if they are superior to other people because of their intelligence or taste.
